title: We are open in PARADISE!
cleaned_text: WOULD YOU LIKE More Energy? To be more relaxed? Or better yet... TO RESTORE YOUR HEALTH? A traditional Natural Medicine is available to you to treat all your health problems, common or complex: Traditional Chinese Medicine Sheryl Sanchez, L.Ac. (530) 877-7003 Based on "You alone can help yourself Heal", SHERYL's personal philosophy on obtaining better health includes the patient actively participating in his/her overall health plan, as she facilitates and aids patients to make responsible, healthy decisions. Please feel free to call any time with any questions regarding your health! ** Work in Progress ** (Link to my BLOG for now) LAB RESOURCES
